description: An attacker may execute an application as a .SCR File (Screensaver) using rundll32.exe desk.cpl,InstallScreenSaver
false_positives: The installation of new screen savers.
name: SCR File Write Event
query: (file.path.text:*.scr AND (NOT (file.path.text:(C\:\\Windows\\System32\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\system32\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\SysWow64\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\winsxs\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\* OR C\:\\$WINDOWS.\~BT\\NewOS\\*))))
author: Christopher Peacock @securepeacock
SCYTHE @scythe_io
